DOC.brief_summary: To study the effect of red wine, beer and fruit juice on endothelial function in patients with coronary Heart disease.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Beer, Red Wine and Fruit Juice on Blood Vessel Function in Persons With Cardiovascular Disease
DOC.criteria: Men or postmenopausal women with stable coronary heart disease Coronary heart disease should be verified by coronary angiography with at least 50% stenosis in at least one coronary vessel. Patients with myocardial infarction within the last tree months Persons with a present or earlier alcohol abuse Persons with a present or earlier drug abuse Person with malign disease Persons, that we consider unsuitable to carry through the examines.
